name: PATIENT_5
description: This table supplements the PATIENT table. It contains basic information about patients.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PHYSICAL_IMPAIRED_C_NAME
columns.description: The Physically Impaired? category ID for the patient.

columns.name: MEMORY_IMPAIRED_C_NAME
columns.description: The Memory Impaired? category ID for the patient.

columns.name: SPEECH_IMPAIRED_C_NAME
columns.description: The Speech Impaired? category ID for the patient.

columns.name: DISABLED_VETERAN_C_NAME
columns.description: The Disabled Veteran? category ID for the patient.

columns.name: VA_RECOGNIZED_C_NAME
columns.description: The VA Recognized? category ID for the patient.

columns.name: HEARING_IMPAIRED_C_NAME
columns.description: The Hard of Hearing? category ID for the patient.

columns.name: VISUALLY_IMPAIRED_C_NAME
columns.description: The Low Vision? category ID for the patient.

columns.name: DIFFICULTY_DRESS_BATHE_C_NAME
columns.description: The Difficulty Dressing or Bathing? category ID for the patient.

columns.name: DIFFICULTY_WITH_ERRAND_C_NAME
columns.description: The Difficulty with Errands? category ID for the patient.

columns.name: SC_PERM_FORM_OF_RES_C_NAME
columns.description: The social care client's permanent form of residence.

columns.name: SC_GROUNDS_FOR_RES_PERM_C_NAME
columns.description: Reason why the social care client is able to hold a residence permit.

columns.name: SC_RES_PERMIT_VALID_TO_DATE
columns.description: Date the social care client's residence permit is valid to.

columns.name: SC_TYPE_OF_RELATIONSHIP_C_NAME
columns.description: Further specify marriage details for the social care client.

columns.name: SOCIAL_CARE_PASSPORT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The passport type.

columns.name: SOCIAL_CARE_PASSPORT_EXP_DATE
columns.description: Date passport expires.

columns.name: RSH_PREFS_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the questionnaire answers of the patient's most recent research preference questionnaire submission.

columns.name: RX_AUTO_REFILL_DELIV_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description: The delivery method to use for refills initiated via auto refill. If not set, the default delivery method is used.

columns.name: PAT_PHOTO
columns.description: This stores the file name of the current patient photo.

columns.name: PEND_PAT_PHOTO
columns.description: This stores the file name of a photo pending approval to be added to the chart.  It has most likely been submitted by the patient via Welcome or MyChart.

columns.name: TYPE_AND_SCR_ELIG_YN
columns.description: This stores whether or not the patient is eligible for a type and screen.

columns.name: NEPH_PCRF_DX_ID
columns.description: Stores a dialysis patient's primary cause of renal failure diagnosis.

columns.name: CONSENT_ABILITY_YN
columns.description: If the patient is able to consent or not. Leaving this item blank will be treated as an answer of "Unknown."

columns.name: SCHOOL_DISTRICT_NUM
columns.description: School district number.

columns.name: MIGRATION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The migrant type: either emigrant or immigrant.

columns.name: MIGRANT_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: If the patient is a migrant, this is the country which the patient is immigrating from or emigrating to.

columns.name: CONGREGATE_CARE_RESIDENT_YN
columns.description: Denotes whether a patient is a resident of a congregate care setting such as a group home, residential treatment facility, or maternity home.

columns.name: SEEN_DOMESTIC_TRAVEL_ALERT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has seen the alert in MyChart or Welcome warning them that they can now enter trips that they've taken inside of the United States.

columns.name: KI_SELF_GUAR_ACCT_VERIF_DATE
columns.description: This item indicates the most recent date the patient verified whether the self-guarantor billing information is correct in Welcome.

columns.name: KI_SELF_GUAR_ACCT_VERIF_STS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item indicates the most recent answer a patient selected when prompted to verify whether the self-guarantor billing information is correct in Welcome.

columns.name: PAT_PHONETIC_NAME
columns.description: Stores the phonetic spelling of the patient's name.

columns.name: PAT_RETIREMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date of a patient's retirement for MSPQ purposes.

columns.name: SPOUSE_RETIREMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date of a patient's spouse's retirement for MSPQ purposes.

columns.name: DRIVERS_LICENSE_NUM
columns.description: The patient's driver's license number.

columns.name: DRIVERS_LICENSE_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The state category ID for the patient's driver's license.

columns.name: EMPLOYMENT_HIRE_DATE
columns.description: The date that a patient was hired at their employer.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_FAX
columns.description: the fax number of the patient's employer.

columns.name: WORK_PHONE
columns.description: The patient's work phone number.

columns.name: H1B_WORK_VISA_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has an H1B work visa.

columns.name: STUDENT_VISA_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has a student visa.

columns.name: BIRTH_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: The county category ID for where the patient was born.

columns.name: CORRESP_CONTACT
columns.description: This name of the contact person associated with a patient's correspondence address.

columns.name: CUR_INP_SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The current Inpatient summary block ID.

columns.name: PREFERRED_FORM_ADDRESS
columns.description: How the patient prefers to be addressed.

columns.name: PAT_ACADEMIC_DEGREE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the academic degree of the patient as it would appear with the patient's name. For example, James Smith, PhD.

columns.name: PREFERRED_NAME_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the type for the patient's preferred name.

columns.name: AHCIC_NUM
columns.description: The patient's AHCIC number.
